title: StarCraft 2: GuMiho's THREE Battlecruisers Surprise Cure! (GSL Code S)
excerpt: Awesome game of StarCraft 2 from the GSL Code S between GuMiho and Cure, featuring Battlecruisers and Terran Mech played far more aggressively than they usually do.
